sentences.sContent: The company has monopolized the soft drinks market.
sentences.sCn: 该公司垄断了软饮料市场。

sentences.sContent: He monopolized the conversation all evening.
sentences.sCn: 整个晚上都是他一个人在说话。

synos.tran: 垄断；独占；拥有…的专卖权

remMethod.val: monopol(y)(垄断) + ize → 垄断， 独占

words.tran: 垄断的；独占性的；专利的
[贸易] 买主独家垄断，买主垄断

trans.tranCn: 垄断；独占；拥有…的专卖权
trans.tranOther: to have complete control over something so that other people cannot share it or take part in it
